prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant yellow and blue colors in a forest setting.
Show me a flying Pokemon with unique insect-like features and a striking color pattern.
Imagine a Pokemon that resembles a bee, with distinct wings and a playful personality.
Generate an aggressive bug Pokemon that excels in aerial battles with bright accents.
Make a Pokemon that combines elements of bees and wasps, showcasing striking colors.
Design a fierce insect Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and has a playful nature.
Give me an evolution of a bee-inspired Pokemon that has powerful stinging abilities.
